Remaking this review because the first one was unfunny. 

[H1]Counter Strike 1.6[/h1]
Before you say "OMFG,  THE GRAPHICS ARE  SHiT,  CALL OF DUTY IS MUCH BETTER", this game was one of the popular games in the whole planet.  [B] WAS[/b],  not anymore. 

[B] Pros [/b] 
Nice community. 
Game is still alive after 16 years. 
Tons of cs 1.6 players with over 10k hours on this game. 
If you don't like those graphics,  you can go to the gamebanana and search  for a resskin.  
Unlike csgo,  you can put any spray you want. [Spoiler] included +18 contest  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)[/spoiler] 
There is still tournaments for that game. 

[B] Cons[/b] 
Tons of the players buy steam accounts "illegally" between 10/13 years of service.A quarter of them got community ban. If you want to get 1.6, [B] PLEASE[/B]  Buy on steam store for 7€ or wait for the next holiday sale instead buying a account. 

[H1] Conclusion[/h1]
Is worth it,  nice community and you can enjoy this game for years. 

10/10 would buy for me and for my friends again.
